rComments: Bakthan is seriously the best professor I've ever had! If you go to office hours he will literally go above and beyond to make sure you succeed in his class! Make sure you do homework because test questions are really similar to tests. Highly recommend taking this class with him!

Bakthan is one of the best professors ever! He has office hours almost everyday and he tells you problems from the homework that will be on the exam. He's a great lecturer and will gladly answer any questions if needed. Do the HW repeatedly, go to office hours everyday, GO TO CLASS, and go to him for extra help if needed. Great class!

Dr. Sigaram is amazing. He has office hours all the time and will give you test questions during lecture. He took Organic Chemistry and links it to Bio and Chem and life. He cares about his students. You want an A? You can earn one if you go to office hours and lecture and LISTEN to what he says. DO NOT USE THE SOLUTION MANUAL!!!!! Good luck!
There are no webcast but his lectures are amazing!

It has been in honor to take a chemistry course with such an amazing professor like Bakthan. He cares about all his students & wants to see them succeed. Go to OH, Section & do the homework that is a MUST! Best professor you will have at UCSC.

It's simple. Bakthan is a wizard. The way he explains organic chemistry is not only extremely engaging, it's very helpful. He had office hours every day but Thursday. If there was a lot of people that came he would find a room with space. We need more Bakthans in this world.

When he says 50% of the test comes from assigned homework, he means it. The other 50% is reworded homework. Attend lecture, know the homework well and go to office hours to clarify questions. Also, the solution manual is of little use due to him doing things differently from the book.

Professor Singaram is one of the best teachers I've ever had. His lectures are extremely fun and informative, his tests are fair and graded quite nicely. If one goes to class, utilizes MSI , office hours (has them every day), there is no reason not to excel

The best professor I have ever taken at UCSC hands down so far. He is caring and wants the students to do well. Last day of his class taking the final and I was sad to leave his class. Would definitely take a class with him as a professor again.

Best course I have taken at UCSC. One of the most passionate, enthusiastic professors I have met on this campus. He is always willing to help out his students, gives office hours four days a week, and goes in the library before exams to help students with questions. Although his course is certainly challenging, it left me a better student.

best professor I have EVER had!!! He is amazing! He really makes you think about the material you are learning, not just the material you need to know for the test. His tests are hard, but if you study, and go to his lectures, all the  material you will cover. He is a very funny guy, always makes you laugh in class, therefore you never get bored!

Professor Bakthan is by far the single best professor i have had so far in my MCD classes. He made me love ochem and if you go to office hours with help you out in anyway possible and really make the topics clear (but come with questions or else your wasting your time). Still a really hard class but if you put in the effort his grading is very fair

The definition of a perfect professor. Lectures are clear, homework is clear. Tests are fair. Office hours everyday. Very encouraging professor. Really cares about his students, and he is a very kind a good hearted person. Would definitely take him again.

best teacher ever. extremely clear and tests are based on homework lecture. You have to do the homework and study the lecture notes. He is extremely fair and such a funny guy! Take ochem with Bakthan!
I totally agree with the 2nd comment before mine. He refuses to talk to some students. I saw that happen. I dont know why. I just found this upsetting even though he talks to me.

Bakthan is the Man!! He picked me up once hitch-hiking. He has four times the mandatory office hours. Walks around the library answering questions prior to midterms. And even walked from Bay/Mission to campus during a strike in the rain to get to class to teach. Challenging but fair as a professor.

He's clear the majority of the time during lecture. He provides laughs and advice to the students (some of them I disagree) during lecture to keep everyone interested. One thing I disliked however was he refused to talk to me once (almost twice) during his office hours... in which I needed clarification on certain materials.

AMAZING teacher.If you have the opportunity,take OChem with Bakthan!He is very clear and straightforward and always happy to clarify anything!Tests are difficult but the only way to overcome them is to do the HW over and over again to get as much practice as possible!Going to lecture is great because he is NEVER dull. Always makes the class laugh!

Best professor at UCSC!!! I hate ochem and the last day of class I was still sad to say goodbye. Expects a lot but is straight forward about what material you need to know. 3 midterms. 50% of material from homework, 50% from lectures. Singaram= laughter + great life advice + inspiration for life, learning, and happiness!
very nice and helpful, just go to class and do the hw. He makes o chem very understandable for future classes

really good professor. ochem is a difficult class, but he makes it okay. he color codes mechanisms and reactions so you actually know whats going on. he also cracks jokes here and there, which lightens up the atmosphere. he stands out as a great professor

i learned that clearer alcohol means less hangovers.  he really applied organic chemistry to real life =)  he changed my whole perspective on ochem...and i really HATED 108a (the teacher does make a difference in the student *ahem* bernasconi..argh)
No Comments
No Comments
Excellent teacher, as well as very genial and approachable. His undergraduate lab team seems extremely devoted - always a good sign.

Bakthan turns the O Chem nightmare into a really great class.  He clearly explains the material in a straight forward way that makes difficult concepts easy to understand.  Let's face it, O Chem is hard, but if youre gonna take it, take it from him.

GREAT teacher.  Very friendly, helpful, and clear.  He's funny and kept the class engaged even at 8 am.  Tests aren't easy, but they reflect the practice tests.  He makes it easy to learn ochem, which isn't easy!

Very funny guy! Tells stories and corny jokes that make class more fun.  And he tries to memorize and know everyone in a 350 student class!  Enthusiastic about ochem and helpful in class and office hours.  Doesn't give answers to the practice tests though

He is a very entertaining teacher. Lectures are always enjoyable which is good because half of the test is based of his lectures and the other half is the homework. He is a great professor and very approachable. you should do good if you know all the hw and understand his lectures

The best chemistry teacher ever.  His class is not easy and you will need to study and know the material, If you do not enjoy chemistry then you may not do well but the upside is you cannot dislike chemistry with Bakthan.  He is an authority in the subject.  It is challenging but Bakthan is extremely clear, thorough and is always available to help.
Subject is extremely difficult that I want to sh*t in my pants! Professor is always there if help is needed!

Bakthan IS amazing. You get out of this class what you put in. Do the h.w. Go to his office hours. Form a study group. Not easy material. You will learn to solve problems for yourself. Excellent teacher. Did I say: do the homework? Do the homework. Go to office hours. The class takes effort but it's worth it.

Bakthan is amazing. Period. He encourages students to think for themselves and not just reproduce a cookie cutter answer. He is encouraging, informative, has office hours every day of the week and really wants students to succeed. Do the h.w.; go to o.h.; learn the concepts; you'll be fine.

He really is a great teacher. The best professor in UCSC no doubt about it. Singaram really does care about how you do. I didn't go to section. I went to his office hours and MSI instead. MSI helped incredibly, and they can tell you the tricks to getting A's on his tests. Do the homework and go to his lectures you'll be golden.

By FAR the best teacher I have had EVER! He really cares that you do your very best and somehow manages to memorize everyone's name in a class of 250 students. The way he grades is very lenient, and he emphasizes that he wants you to compete with yourself, not your other classmates. GREAT PROFESSOR.

Bakthan Is an AMAZING professor. I am so grateful for his helpfulness! GO TO HIS OFFICE HOURS. He memorizes people's names and can possible know your whole class' name if you dare him. He cares about his students and goes out of his way to help you earn the BEST grade.

Best teacher ever. Tells you exactly what he wants and doesn't trick you on tests. Very helpful outside of class and even wanders around the library seeing if any of his students need help. First time I actually enjoyed a chem class.

Bakthan is absolutely phenomenal. I have never met a professor like him in college that cares so much for his students. He is extremely approachable, helpful and he will roam the S&E library the night before the exam to help his students. His class is really hard and requires a lot of time and dedication, but if you put in the work it will pay off!
One rad dude!

SENSATIONAL Professor. Really interested in his student's success. U'll find him in the S&E library looking to help students. he will make jokes. he will remember UR entire name (middle too) Just to prove he isn't losing his mind. LOL. In this class he teaches the value of competing with yourself... by making it hard to get an A/B.But it's worth it

He's definitely one of the hardest teachers I've taken, but if you go to his office hours, which are every day and twenty times better than his lousy TAs, you should do fine. Also, don't panic, I think he curves despite what he says. There's no way I could've gotten the grade I got otherwise.

He's class is very interesting but hard to get a good grade. I studied many hours doing hw and outside of the class but if you have to take ochem u need to take it with him bc he's very clear, helpful and friendly. He probably will reteach u 108A he is that helpful, he is everywhere, his office hour is like free tutoring,take advantage of it.

BEST PROFESSOR EVER!HE IS WILLING TO HELP ANYONE WHO WILLING TO PUT AN EFFERT INTO THE CLASS. YOU MUST ALSO STUDY INTENSIVELY BECAUSE HIS TEST ARE HARD BUT AN AMAZING TEACHER. FUNNY AS WELL. ETHER BUNNY!!!! <--(ONE OF HIS JOKES)

hes the tightest teacher everrrrr!! hes so funny and cool and knows your name before you even introduce yourself. he'll sneak up behind you in the library and ask you your last name then give your first name. He makes 8am class really worth while and makes ochem really fun. Hard to get an A but def hard to fail too =)

Favorite chem teacher =) Very clear, nice, and funny! Easy to talk to, and has a good memory. I usually dont like o chem, but he made it interesting and i dint mind getting up for an eight am. He also tells funny little jokes too

Really enjoyed attending lectures because he actually made organic chem more interesting. Very straight forward teacher and can tell he enjoys his job. Very approachable. Study all lecture notes and you will do very well

bahktan is probably THE BEST PROFESSOR EVERRRR. his class lectures are funny, very entertaining - considering it's ORGANIC CHEMISTRY and he is really helpful so if u get a chance to take this guy, DO ITTT. go to his office hours. ochem is an a really hard class, for me at least but he def made me like it. his tests however are really hard, def stud

Excellent teacher and world-class scientist.  Learning O-chem from Bakthan is a privilege and honor.  He is a living example of what a great organic chemist can be.  His dedication to teaching is always evident.  Funny jokes, memorable analogies, and keen observations are abundant in his presentations.

His tests seemed to come out of no where.  mainly i wasn't ready for the types of questions he asked.  lecture was filled with vague topical recaps, mechanisms, and entertaining yet unhelpful information.  i would have like the class better if i didn't have to pass it, aauditing would have been great. he was willing to help pull up my grade
THE BEST PROF YOULL EVER HAVE. really cares about students, hilarious in class, interesting lectures, and recaps valuable "life lessons". awesome.
Great professor. He was a great lecturer. Be prepared to study because o chem is challenging.

Damn. THis guy is the ****ing Tiger Woods of Ochem professors. I**** u not.  Forget all of the haters who didnt do well in his class. He wants u to get an A and even tho he uses past exams, and some say its unfair, tell that to the fat portion of people w
Best prof eva!
No Comments

Wonderful teacher, hilarious and clear lectures. Always available for questions, and will work with you patiently until you understand. I liked o chem with him so much I almost switched to be a chem major.
tight professor!
No Comments
Great Professor.I actually enjoyed going to lecture.He was clear, helpful, and funny.He even remembered everyones name in the class.Go to his office hours it will only help you in the long run!!!

VERY UNFAIR if you don't have access to past exams but TOO EASY if you have access to them and have people tell you what's gonna be on the tests. I don't understand when teachers use the same tests for 10 years because the purpose is to be fair to everyone.Otherwise, very good teacher.

this class explains how ochem REALLY is. bakhthan kicks ass, but you prolly already knew that. he's very funny. fact: bakhthan is always in his office unless it's lunchtime, dinner time or he has a meeting. you can usually find him in thimann in the evenings.
Excellent Teacher, very clear and concise.  If you want an A+ memorize all his practice tests.  However, he is a little too interested in the cute girls in the class.

The best OChem professor you will ever have!  Bakthan is awesome!  He actually makes you enjoy organic chemistry.  His tests are so fair and very representative of the material.  Take him if you can!  You will remember his funny jokes on the MCATs.

A lot better than Bernasconi. Tries to explain the concept as easy as possible. Exams were okay as long as you do homework problems and review his notes. Try to go to his office hours, if possible. He's there to help you.
He makes chemistry very interesting always making references to the everyday uses of organic chemistry. His lectures are so interesting and easy to follow. He really wants his students to succeed.
made o chem barable. GREAT teacher.

Bakthan is very clear and funny. He makes waking up at 8am worth it. He makes a lot of drug and alcohol based jokes. He puts a very strong focus on synthesis and "roadmap problems" rather than straight memorization.

very clear in explaining a very difficult subject and is willing to help people outside of class.  He also goes through every single exam, after his ta's grade them, to make sure that everyone get all the points that they deserve.

An excellent teacher! The very best, had him for 108B and decided to take his 143, and it was so great I decided to get a Chem minor!  A very cool guy, funny, and goes above and beyond to make sure his students learn the material
